thread.title: Pretend you’re Bettie Page with NYX’s new Pin Up Pout lipstick line
thread.title_full: Pretend you’re Bettie Page with NYX’s new Pin Up Pout lipstick line

author: Amanda Grace
title: Pretend you’re Bettie Page with NYX’s new Pin Up Pout lipstick line
text:
Pretend you’re Bettie Page with NYX’s new Pin Up Pout lipstick line NYX Cosmetics is known for making all of our makeup dreams come true at affordable prices. If you have ever aspired to possess the lips of pin-up girl such as Bettie Page or burlesque queen Dita Von Teese, we have good news! You’ll want all 24 shades of the new Pin Up Pout Collection from NYX !
These creamy classic lipsticks are a throwback to their signature lipsticks that started it all . We are happy to put our liquid lippies down for a minute to use the perfectly retro lipsticks ! They have a perfect modern twist, and 24 hues mean there are SO MANY options. Not every color in the collection is a vintage red or nude, there are highly pigmented wild cards like blue and violet that we can’t wait to try!
NYX Cosmetics The NYX Pin Up Pout collection is available on NYX’s website, at Ulta stores, and on their website for $7.99 each, which means we can try them out without breaking the bank! Currently, when you purchase them at Ulta.com you can also get a discount — buy one, get one half off!
Behind every great woman is great lipstick. What's your signature shade? #ultabeauty 
A photo posted by Ulta Beauty (@ultabeauty) on Jan 26, 2017 at 1:31pm PST 
Pin-Up Pout Lipstick in RED HAUTE , $7.99 Ulta This deep red is a perfect vampy shade!
Pin-Up Pout Lipstick in SMOKE ME , $7.99 Ulta Winter isn’t over just yet! We are buying all the cool grays we can!
Pin-Up Pout Lipstick in REBEL SOUL , $7.99 Ulta We love how Rebel Soul is the perfect mix of wine and berry, it would look great on all skin tones!
Pin-Up Pout Lipstick in BOUNDLESS , $7.99 Ulta Boundless is great for when you want a step above a nude, the soft pink is great for date night!
Pin-Up Pout Lipstick in WILD SPIRIT , $7.99 Ulta Wild definitely lives up to its name! This highly pigmented indigo is such a fun shade!
Which Pin Up Pout shade will you try? Head on over to Ulta to see if anything strikes your fancy!
